I am an aquatic ecologist specializing in dreissenid mussels based in the Great Lakes region. 
Currently, I work with the Elgin Lab as a NOAA Affiliate research assistant. I enjoy hiking, camping, and drinking too much coffee. 

- Navigate through the site to see <a href="https://rorzechowski.github.io/portfolio/current_projects.html">current</a> and <a href="https://rorzechowski.github.io/portfolio/past_projects.html">past</a> projects and topics that I have worked on. 
- Utilize the Resources button for helpful <a href="https://rorzechowski.github.io/portfolio/blog_list.html">blogs</a>, <a href="https://rorzechowski.github.io/portfolio/book_list.html">books</a>, or <a href="https://rorzechowski.github.io/portfolio/video_list.html">binge watch</a> videos to expand your knowledge on statistics, data science, the R programming language, and more.
